markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Call of the Wild](/Feats.aspx?ID=4716) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid. You can spend 10 minutes in concert with nature to replace a spell you’ve prepared in one of your druid spell slots with a summon animal or summon plant or fungus spell of the same rank.

<title level="2">Call of the Wild leads to...</title>
[Primal Summons](/Feats.aspx?ID=4752)
name: Call of the Wild
